confirmationThreshold.description: Number of required confirmations to consider a transaction as final.

blockScanLimit.description: Time limit amount to scan blocks for address/transaction metadata.

blockScanLimitUnit.description: Time limit unit type for address/transaction metadata block scanning as defined by {@link java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit}.

blockCacheLimit.description: The time limit amount to keep cached copies of blocks and transactions.

blockCacheLimitUnit.description: Time limit unit type subset equivalent to {@link java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit} for keeping cached copies of blocks/transactions.
